that it's really important to be able to

it allows you to pack a lot less so a

we do that and so there are a few ways

we often hand wash things in the sink

are and we take our stuff there and have

have it done by the hotel you're staying
in so those are our three big options
and I will go ahead and explain some of

the most expensive but easiest ways to
get your laundry done while you're

than you know 12 to 24 hours somewhere
in there and as you can see we had to do

shirts and pants and whatnot it all came
